articles.author: Marc Malkin
articles.title: Dev Patel on ‘Monkey Man’ Sequel Possibilities and Trans Representation: ‘This Is an Anthem for the Underdogs, the Voiceless and the Marginalized’ - Variety
articles.description: Dev Patel talks about "Monkey Man" trans representation and whether he's thinking about a sequel.
articles.content:
Dev Patel refused to let the slew of injuries he suffered while filming his elaborate fight scenes in “Monkey Man” get in the way of him completing the movie.
Patel not only directed and co-wrote th… [+2233 chars]

articles.description: "Red Directive" available for free on same day it debuts on Paramount+
articles.content: As they do for each new season for all of their shows, Paramount+ has made the entire season 5 premiere of Star Trek: Discovery available online for free. Except this time the did it on the same day … [+1033 chars]
